name: Elevit Tablets 100
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Elevit is a once-daily vitamin and mineral supplement which is specially formulated with essential nutrients to help meet the nutritional needs of women preparing their body for pregnancy, those pregnant and breastfeeding. Elevit helps provide both mother and baby with nutritional support to help baby's healthy development. Elevit contains a range of vitamins and minerals including the highest level of folic acid and iron of any pregnancy multivitamin and a high level of iodine for brain development. Folic acid is clinically proven to reduce the risk of birth defects, like spina bifida, iron helps to prevent iron deficiency and iodine assists baby's brain development. 
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Always read the label. Use only as directed. If you have had a baby with a neural tube defect/spina bifida, seek specific medical advice. 
This product contains selenium which is toxic in high doses. A daily dose of 100mcg for adults of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded. Suitable for use by adults only. Do not exceed the stated dose of folic acid except on medical advice.  
Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each tablet contains:Folic Acid 800mcgIron (as ferrous fumarate) 60mgIodine (as potassium iodide) 220mcg Thiamine (Vitamin B1, as thiamine nitrate) 1.4mgRiboflavine (Vitamin B2) 1.4mgNicatinamide 18mgPantothenic acid (Vitamin B5, as calcium pantothenate) 6mgPyridoxine (Vitamin B6, as pyridoxine hydrochloride) 1.9mgCyanocobalamin (Vitamin B12) 2.6mcgAscorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 85mgCholecalciferol (Vitamin D3 200IU) 5mcgdl-alpha tocopherol (Vitamin E, as dl-alpha tocopheryl acetate) 18.7mg Biotin (Vitamin H) 30mcgCalcium (as calcium hydrogen phosphate anhydrous, calcium pantothenate and calcium carbonate) 125mgMagnesium (as magnesium oxide-heavy and magnesium sterate) 100mgCopper (as cupric sulphate anhydrous) 1mgManganese (as manganese sulfate monohydrate) 1.9mgZinc (as zinc citrate trihydrate) 11mgSelenium (as sodium selenite) 50mcg
Contains sucrose. Gluten free. Free of Porcine and Bovine derived ingredients. 
    
    
      Directions
      Take Elevit for at least one month before pregnancy, throughout pregnancy and the breastfeeding period. 
Directions for Use: Take one tablet daily with the main meal or as directed by your healthcare professional. 
    
    
      Indications

name: Menevit 90 Capsules
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Designed for Male Fertility.Men can take positive steps to support conception by adopting a healthier lifestyle, and in particular being made aware of sperm health.Menevit is a supplement specifically formulated to maintain sperm health for couples planning pregnancy.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      Always read the label. Use only as directed. 

This product contains selenium which is toxic in high doses. A daily dose of 100 ìg of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded.
Not suitable for use by children under 15 years. 

    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      Each Menevit capsule contains:
Vitamin C 100mg
Zinc 25mg
Vitamin E 400IU
Folic acid 500µg
Lycopene 6mg
Garlic oil 333µg
Selenium 26µg

Menevit capsules are gluten free and free of animal product.

    
    
      Directions
      Men – Take one capsule daily with food, preferably for at least 90 days prior to planned conception. 

Continue taking Menevit once daily as required or as directed by your doctor. 

    
    
      Indications

name: Elevit Women's Multi 100 Tablets
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      100 Tablet Pack - lasts more than 3  months (once-a-day dosage)
Being a mum is a challenging and rewarding role and with all that life throws at you; sometimes you can forget to take care of yourself. Elevit Women's Multi can help. It has been specifically tailored with a unique combination of nutrients to help support the needs of women with children. It contains a range of multivitamins and minerals including:

Iron: to help boost energy levels
Calcium: To help build and maintain healthy bones
B group vitamins: to help reduce stress
Vitamin C and zinc: to maintain immunity
Taken once daily, Elevit Women’s Multi helps to support your needs as a woman and mum.
Also available in 60 tablet size.
Elevit Women's Multi is not a pregnancy supplement and should only be taken after breastfeeding. Elevit with Iodine is suitable for preconception, pregnancy & breastfeeding.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      
    
    
      Directions
      
    
    
      Indications

name: Elevit Morning Sickness Relief 30 Tablets
description:
Information
      
    
    
      General Information
      Your secret for up to 12 hour relief from morning sickness
Morning sickness is a common feeling of nausea, that can result in vomiting, often experienced in the early stages of pregnancy. It is thought to be caused by changes in hormones and/or blood pressure. But contrary to its name, it can occur at any time of the day or night and it can continue throughout the pregnancy.Up to 80% of women may experience morning sickness in the 1st trimester. 1 in 5, may continue to experience it into the 2nd trimester, and occasionally, some women continue to experience it into the 3rd trimester.
It also contains a range of ingredients to help meet your changed nutritional requirements throughout conception, pregnancy and breastfeeding.You can try to minimise your morning sickness by eating regular small meals and avoiding foods and smells that cause nausea. These will be different for each person but could include citrus, milk, coffee, tea and foods with high iron content. Also make sure you get plenty of fresh air and rest.
New Elevit Morning Sickness Relief has been specially formulated with natural ginger and vitamin B6 which have been shown in studies1,2 to help reduce the frequency and severity of morning sickness and help relieve symptoms such as nausea and vomiting.Elevit Morning Sickness Relief is a 12 hour sustained release bi-layer tablet which combines:

Layer 1 provides an immediate release of natural ginger and vitamin B6 to help provide rapid relief of nausea and vomiting.
Layer 2 is a sustained release of ginger which will help to sustain the relief for up to 12 hours.
Take one tablet every 12 hours to help provide sustained relief from your symptoms. Elevit Morning Sickness Relief is suitable to use during pregnancy and in combination with Elevit pregnancy multivitamins.
    
    
      Miscellaneous
      
    
    
      Drug Interactions
      
    
    
      Warnings
      
    
    
      Common Uses
      
    
    
      Ingredients
      
    
    
      Directions
      
    
    
      Indications
